name: headlock
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
especially in wrestling, a way of holding an opponent with your arm around their head so that they cannot move: in a headlock He grabbed his opponent in a headlock. A police officer managed to get the gunman in a headlock.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir stage act is a choreographed sequence that ensures the throws and headlocks won't seriously injure them. The agent held the man in a headlock until the police arrived.I was in a headlock, face down in the dirt and couldn't breathe.
